name: Issuance
description: Issuance smart contract. This contract is used for crowdfunding, token sale event.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

eventDecorators.name: SaleEventCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

eventDecorators.name: SaleEventInvested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

eventDecorators.name: SaleEventWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

eventDecorators.name: Transition
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

functionDecorators.name: closeEvent
functionDecorators.description: Close event. Stage transits to CLOSE.

functionDecorators.name: invest
functionDecorators.description: Investor send fund using this method. Must be called on stage OPEN.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: reSetupEvent
functionDecorators.description: Re setup event. Stage transits to SETUP.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setEvent
functionDecorators.description: Set event. Stage must be SETUP or OPEN.

functionDecorators.name: setIssuanceToken
functionDecorators.description: Set issuance token that can be distributed later. Token must be inherited from IERC20Mintable.

functionDecorators.name: setupEvent
functionDecorators.description: Setup an upcoming event. Must call at stage SETUP.

parameterDecorators.name: _event
parameterDecorators.description: Name of event, used as primary key.

parameterDecorators.name: _issuancePrice
parameterDecorators.description: Price of the issuance token, ETH/Token rate.

parameterDecorators.name: _minDeposit
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum amount that investor can deposit (Ether format).

parameterDecorators.name: _maxDeposit
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum amount that investor can deposit (Ether format).

parameterDecorators.name: _fundGoal
parameterDecorators.description: Funding amount goal for this event (Ether format).

parameterDecorators.name: _timeEnd
parameterDecorators.description: Event will close at this time (in epoch timestamp).

functionDecorators.name: startEvent
functionDecorators.description: Start event. Stage transits to OPEN.

functionDecorators.name: transferFund
functionDecorators.description: Deployer call this method to transfer contract balance to wallet. Must be called on stage CLOSE.

parameterDecorators.name: _wallet
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address that will receive fund.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Investor call this method to receive issuance token. Must be called on stage CLOSE.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawEvent
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw event. Stage transits to WITHDRAW.
